website_summaries.verdict: A great choice if you want a wristlet that is both practical and beautiful. Not only does it offer useful features, but it sports the stylish looks that are synonymous with the brand.
pros: A must-have for fans of Michael Kors fashions
Includes the MK signature print in durable leather
Has roomy interior with ample pockets
cons: On the large side for a wristlet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect & Classy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Michael Kors wristlet and I LOVE IT!!! It has three pockets, deep enough to fit my iPhone 8+!!! Ladies- this is perfect if you don’t like carrying around a purse. Perfect for date nights and acts like a wallet if you are like me and use a business tote daily. Great quality and I highly recommend it to others!! This would be a great birthday gift, anniversary or even a Christmas gift!! Can’t go wrong with it!!! Happy buyer!!
customer_reviews.author: K713

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, good feel in hand
customer_reviews.text: Simply aaaaamazing! Great quality, good feel in hand, not to bulky, not ridiculously small, just right for your phone, keys, cards, cash and even room for some makup essentials! Its legit! Christmas present a success!!! Came nicely wraped like a MK product would, pakaging was very exceptional!
customer_reviews.author: ItsMe

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It holds everything I need
customer_reviews.text: If this is a real Michael Kors wristlets, I love it. It holds everything I need, and the convertible strap is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Ellemor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this wristlet. Just the right size for phone, small wallet, keys. Have already received many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: This product looked NOTHING like the photo, wrong color, much longer strap, no other pockets other than the main pocket. I was so excited to see this delivered and then so disappointed when it wasn’t what I ordered. I will never order from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Steven J. LaMarre

customer_reviews.title: Stocking stuffer gift for the wife ....
customer_reviews.text: .... she loves it. "Perfect size, perfect style, perfect color, perfect everything." That's an exact quote. I scored points and that's all that matters. She takes this with her wherever she goes.
customer_reviews.author: John Russell Perry

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, wondering if it’s even authentic. Smaller than the one I’ve had in the past. Also no authenticity card, replaced with a card from Japan. Before you purchase compare it to the one on the Michael Kors website. Letters also not straight and too light to see unless you’re standing under a light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible investment
customer_reviews.text: Lacks quality and way over price you will definitely regret.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say much more other than it’s terrific. Absolutely love it and it’s roomy. I don’t like anything large so this is perfect for me. I use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: joanie

customer_reviews.title: Signature requires
customer_reviews.text: It might be nice if you not have signature required with the USPS! I work and cannot be home to sign for it so now I have to deal with taking off work to go to the post office to get it. This thing is costing me more than it’s worth.
customer_reviews.author: PAVN8R

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not the real thing butttttt
customer_reviews.text: Nice little wristlet, does not come packaged as though it is a real MK wallet buttttttttt, still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstin Wascom

customer_reviews.title: Love it. May get the other color now
customer_reviews.text: Love it. May get the other color now. Perfect little size for cash, cards, iPhone plus, powder compact & gloss, and keys with a little room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn C. Blain

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute wristlet. Purchased it as a gift for my daughter. She uses it all the time and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyprea

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Of all the MK I brought, the workmanship if this looks so cheap, looks like a cheap knockoffs
customer_reviews.author: Johnny C.

customer_reviews.title: MK all the way.
customer_reviews.text: This is for a Xmas gift. Nicely.shipped and nice material.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for on the go
customer_reviews.text: I use this quite a bit. Holds money, CC & my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Just Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift / Great Price
customer_reviews.text: What girl doesn't like MK, get those brownie points in at this price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Rodgers 4 Prez

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor Quality, wristlet band is falling a part, see pictures.... not happy! Stay away!
customer_reviews.author: Susete

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order from this company!
customer_reviews.text: This bag/zipper was cheap looking & extremely to small! I have been trying to return this bag & I keep getting the run around. I will never order from outside company (Shophydra) again!!
customer_reviews.author: Thea Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Functionality
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Perfect size for my phone, chapstick, small thing of lotion and my Id.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri P

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I really like little purse. It’s just to small unable to put my IPhone and keys in it.
customer_reviews.author: Deena

customer_reviews.title: Great Size
customer_reviews.text: I love this size of the wristlet. It can fit my iphone 7plus in there. I love the color because I had an all white wallet and it is hard not to get it dirty. I must say I am satisfied with the delivery. I ordered the bag on friday and it came that monday! Thanks Amazon for such the quick delivery!!
customer_reviews.author: Niya

customer_reviews.title: Michael kors
customer_reviews.text: Is really good size and fits perfect in my purse easy to carry
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: This bag was the perfect gift for my wife! She wanted something smaller and elegant for an evening out and this certainly fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Shakes

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: This item is extremely small. Just enough room for keys and a little cash.
customer_reviews.author: Eugenia Grant

customer_reviews.title: I love this product super cute
customer_reviews.text: I love this its the perfect size and it was a great price
customer_reviews.author: roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Product is good, size comes out to be little small than it looks.
customer_reviews.text: Product looks same as one in the picture. Well packed and looks good. Size is little small than it looks like.
customer_reviews.author: Divesh Verma

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Nice size wallet/purse to have when you ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Nice size wallet/purse to have when you don’t want to carry your big one. My phone can fit in it also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Review measurement before ordering.  There are two sizes plus a small change purse
customer_reviews.text: Larger than anticipated. Thought I was ordering the Medium size but like it anyway. Should have measured the one I own first. Great wristlet and love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Bjurstrom

customer_reviews.title: There is a side zipper great for receipts
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size to fit my iPhone 7 Plus, 3 credit cards and a few other little things in the large compartment. There is a side zipper great for receipts, etc.
customer_reviews.author: J RABE

customer_reviews.title: Love this wristlet! Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Love this wristlet! It is the perfect size needed to carry essentials and my phone fits inside which is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much need order another in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Looks great with anything and super light and small .
customer_reviews.text: Great item I use mine for work as a tip bag and this little bag has held up to the not so fancy life lol also great for going out and want something light to carry around your wrist.
customer_reviews.author: raven

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love it...just what I was looking for....I use it as a wristlet & crossbody with my long leather brown strap from another purse lol... waiting on the black mk now
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Dimples

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter-in-law. she loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved this bag
customer_reviews.text: Loved this bag, it was stylish and I carried my iPhone X, car key, house keys quite easily. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: kay

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't carry a lot of things inside of ut
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, cause when I go anywhere it's easier to carry around
customer_reviews.author: Trey Browne-Williams

customer_reviews.title: You will love it too!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I bought the white one in the spring so had to have this one for fall!
customer_reviews.author: RGK

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: i love it! the quality is good and size is perfect for my iphone x, cash, cards n keys.
customer_reviews.author: Nur S.

customer_reviews.title: I love the room in this wristlet
customer_reviews.text: I love the room in this wristlet. Enough room for phone, phone charger, lipgloss, credit cards, keys. Quality is great! Wish it had option for strap but I could get a strap from another purse to use
customer_reviews.author: Alva Alaniz

customer_reviews.title: convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love the MK wallet wristlet & it's color because it goes with everything as well as can hold all my main items nedded...
customer_reviews.author: keisha

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item. Exactly as described and perfect for what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Right size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my phone and few items when I don’t want to carry my purse
customer_reviews.author: Jada F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. I love it! Large enough for my Note 9.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Popp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Was just what I needed! It also came with authentic tags and was sold just like in the outlet store.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Scaramuzzino

customer_reviews.title: Nice lovely!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy so in love I also brought adjustable chain
customer_reviews.author: sbaugh

customer_reviews.title: It’s small.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, just wish it was a bit bigger once your phone is in it nothing else really fits.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina sampath

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wristlet and is authentic
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wristlet and is authentic! It’s the perfect size to hold everything I need and looks exactly like the picture. I’m in love!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Authentic
customer_reviews.text: AUTHENTIC, gorgeous, sophisticated style exactly what I was missing now I can travel light if I want to without needing to bring along my large MK bag...
customer_reviews.author: BoricuaQueen

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Holds my cell phone and a few ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Holds my cell phone and a few essentials. Well made!
customer_reviews.author: Karin Kmetz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured, also came in MK paper with official tag! Definitely authentic 😍.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Davis

customer_reviews.title: Just as it looks in pictures!!
customer_reviews.text: Just as it looks in the picture!!!! My mom is going to fall in love at Christmas!!!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan C Craig

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my wristlet it is just what I expected...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little purse for all you need for a night out
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of MK purses but this one was darker than the picture made it look like. The trademark "MK" is barely noticeable. Otherwise it's good quality and perfect size to hold what I need and my phone - not too many wristlets allow for that.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Love this purse. Big enough to take the basics, phone, keys, cards but small enough to put in other bigger bags is necessary. In addition I can slip it all the way up my arm under my arm and still have my hands free.
customer_reviews.author: Lara Croft

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this bag, she wants another one but a little larger.
customer_reviews.author: victoria

product_meta.title: MICHAEL Michael Kors Jet Set Women's Coated Twill Convertible Logo Wristlet
product_meta.description:
A luxe essential for a day on the go, this wristlet is designed to hold a smartphone, keys and cards. Michael Kors logo print and plaque combine with leather trim for a timeless accessory.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :7.87 x 1.18 x 5.12 inches; 3.35 Ounces
 * Item model number :32S7GJSW3B
 * Department :Womens
 * Date First Available :February 15, 2017
 * Manufacturer :Michael Kors
 * ASIN :B06WRSNP4M

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #114,282 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #52098 inWomen's Shops 
    *  #57 inWomen's Wristlet Handbags 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars235 ratings A luxe essential for a day on the go, this wristlet is designed to hold a smartphone, keys and cards. Michael Kors logo print and plaque combine with leather trim for a timeless accessory.
feature_bullets: Signature MK print coated twill with gold-tone hardware
Top zip closure with 100% Polyester lining
